title: Novavax, Zoom Video, Moderna, Nike: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Vaccine makers and Zoom Video are up premarket; Travel stocks and energy producers are taking a hit
body:
Just when it seemed like some version of normalcy was on the horizon, Omicron has crashed the party, and markets are taking notice.
Stock futures, oil prices and bond yields are sinking on worries that a rise in Covid-19 cases will weigh on growth and boost inflation. Here’s what we’re watching in Monday’s trading:
